content:
ConcurrencyMode Enum

Definition

Specifies the concurrency options for the properties in a conceptual model.

In this Article

public enum ConcurrencyMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ConcurrencyMode

Remarks

For more information about how to use this enumeration in a schema, see Conceptual Design (EDM).

Fields

Fixed

The property is always validated at write time.
None

The property is never validated at write time. This is the default concurrency mode.
